node.title: Five charged with drugs, firearm offences after in Bay of Plenty raids
node.description: Five people have been arrested following police raids across Eastern Bay of Plenty this week.
node.content:
["Five people have been arrested following police raids across Eastern Bay of Plenty this week.", "", "
\nPhoto: RNZ / Richard Tindiller\n
", "Searches were made at properties in \u014cp\u014dtiki, Ruatoki, Whakat\u0101ne and Kawerau.", "In Kawerau, police seized a firearm, ammunition, 70 grams of cannabis and 11 grams of methamphetamine.", "A firearm was seized in \u014cp\u014dtiki, and in Ruatoki, officers seized two firearms, ammunition and a small quantity of methamphetamine", "Cannabis was seized in Whakat\u0101ne.", "Three women and two men are due to appear in the Whakat\u0101ne District Court over the next few weeks on charges including possession of methamphetamine for supply and unlawful possession of firearms."]
